Steadfast Networks has direct access to one of the largest carrier hotels in the world with redundancy and uptime among their top priorities.

This is Chromobyte's first appearance here on LET, as far as offering something, and we'd like to make it special. We are not new to the hosting industry as we were founded in Q4 2011 and have been going strong ever since. From the beginning, I have personally taken great pride in the support we offer. We strive to keep prices low while offering considerably high quality services. This philosophy goes hand-in-hand with our support staff as we make every decision strictly based around our customers. Support requests are responded to in helpful, professional, and fruitful replies - no three word answers from us.

Test IP: 208.117.11.114 (Ping Me!)

**Operating Systems**
Chromobyte utilizes OpenVZ technology. As such, Linux is the only supported operating system. We offer CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora, and Scientific as of now. More can be added by request.

**Payment**
Chromobyte currently only accepts payments via PayPal. If you do not have a PayPal account, you can pay with a credit/debit card processed through PayPal.
